name: Droidian Rush
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys for movement. Click to shoot.

Drop in to Robot City, where a group of haywire Droidians have invaded and begun wreaking havoc. Be a hero and save the populace, or go rogue and shoot everything in your way.

Made in about 30 hours during a 48 hour game jam. Takes about 10 minutes to play through. My first "completed" game.

Recently updated with a number of minor bug fixes. Also, I finally fixed an annoying audio issue with health pickups.
